name: Camp Camp Lunar Lander
description:
Unofficial fan made game based on Rooster Teeth's Camp Camp

Space Kid has built his rocket and is trying to get to his favorite crater on the moon. Can you help him?

Pass through multiple levels attempting to collect ores to refuel your systems, and reach the end of the game..

Controls: 
WASD = Thrusters and Rotate
Q = Thrusters Off
E = Thrusters Full On
F = Booster Mode (quick boost of power at increased fuel usage)

The Game may have some bugs in it, I created it a several months ago and just now got around to putting it up after season 2 started.

The art in this game is pulled straight from the show.

Camp Camp Infinite Runner

Behind the Scenes:
I was originally inspired to create this game because of the art style of the show. It leans so much into a 2d game that I just wanted to make something, anything based on it. So I created this and the Lunar Lander Clone. It originally was going to contain an easter egg that required you to collect certain hidden items and then find a puzzle hidden within the credits that would have led you to figure out the egg in the Infinite Runner, but I ran out of time and cancelled that idea.... Maybe next time.
